section.name: Downloading the plugin
section.p: The easiest way to install the plugin is with Maven itself. Issue a command like the following:
You'll need to run this command as a user with write access to $MAVEN_HOME/plugins.

Alternatively, you can install the plugin manually - Firstly download the jar from the download page and place it into your $MAVEN_HOME/plugins directory. You may need to manually delete your plugin cache (usually ~/.maven/cache) in order for the new version to be deployed properly.
